main event: A report of an unidentified flying object sighting occurred on January 23, 1959, southwest of Herschel Island, Canada.
interesting points: The object was described as a round shape with a flat bottom, resembling half the size of an orange,The sighting lasted approximately 20 minutes and the object appeared stationary,Observers reported clear weather with a few scattered clouds during the sighting,The object disappeared suddenly and did not fade away,There were no discernible features or sounds associated with the object.
sighted object: round object with flat bottom, orange color
